metadata.title: CVE-2018-18405 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** jQuery v2.2.2 allows XSS via a crafted onerror attribute ofan IMG element. NOTE: this vulnerability has been reported to be spamentry.

criterions.comment: jquery: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
